p: The experimental data with the onset and end pressure of layer appearance with different temperature, pressure and CO 2 mole percentage were listed in Tables 3 and 4. When temperature drops from 132 °C to 30 °C, there is more possibility of the layer existed between CO 2 and condensate gas. From 132.18 °C to 30 °C, there is a gradual declined reduction in the end pressure of layer, reaching a figure of 7.5 Mpa.
